top.title: Rubio warns Europe of new era in geopolitics before big Munich speech
top.summary: The US Secretary of State will address the first major transatlantic meeting since Donald Trump threatened to annex Greenland.

top.title: Watch: How Andrew's BBC interview compares to what Epstein emails tell us now
top.summary: Following the latest release of the Epstein files, claims made by the then Prince Andrew in 2019 are under fresh scrutiny.

top.title: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
top.summary: The White House calls it the largest deregulation in US history, but environmentalists say it will prove costly for Americans.

top.title: John Wick game starring Keanu Reeves unveiled at PlayStation showcase
top.summary: It's not the first time the iconic hitman has appeared in games, but Saber's will be the first voiced by Reeves.

top.title: AI coding platform's flaws allow BBC reporter to be hacked
top.summary: Vibe-coding tools - which let people without coding skills create apps using AI - are exploding in popularity.

top.title: Porn site fined £800,000 for not rolling out age checks
top.summary: Separately, message board 4chan says it will refuse to pay an expected £520,000 fine from the media regulator.
